tool_description:
High performance API for horse racing statistical modelling, application development and web content. Query our database of over 450,000 horse racing results and racecards.

For the latest updates and features, visit our website:

**🇺🇸 FULL US COVERAGE AVAILABLE** (Website subscriptions only)

Website: https://www.theracingapi.com | Documentation: https://api.theracingapi.com/documentation

IMPORTANT NOTE: Latest The Racing API features & endpoints may not always be available via RapidAPI
name: The Racing API
title: The Racing API

api_list.name: Racecard horse results
api_list.description: Get results for a horse on today or tomorrows racecards (PRO PLAN)

optional_parameters.name: max_distance_y
optional_parameters.description: Query results by maximum race distance (yards)

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Query results by race type

optional_parameters.name: going
optional_parameters.description: Query results by going

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Filter racecards by region codes. Get the full list using the 'List regions' endpoint.
Note: If the course query parameter is specified, this will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: course
optional_parameters.description: Query results by course ids. Get the full list using the 'List courses' endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: age_band
optional_parameters.description: Query results by age band

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Query results from date with format YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: sex_restriction
optional_parameters.description: Query results by sex restriction

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Query results to date with format YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: min_distance_y
optional_parameters.description: Query results by minimum race distance (yards)

optional_parameters.name: race_class
optional_parameters.description: Query results by class
